text: Spiers Memorial Award is presented in recognition of an individual who has made an outstanding contribution to the field of a Faraday Discussion.https://www.rsc.org/ScienceAndTechnology/Awards/SpiersMemorialAward/ The award, given annually since 1929, includes £2000, a medal and a certificate, and recognizes an individual who has made an outstanding contribution to the field of a Faraday Discussion.https://spie.org/about- spie/spie-member-news/naomi-halas-receives-the-2019-spiers-memorial- award?SSO=1 == References == == External links == * http://www.rsc.org/ScienceAndTechnology/Awards/SpiersMemorialAward/ Category:Awards
title: Spiers Memorial Award
